subtitle: The softness of the rice contrasts very well with the sugared top.

method.text: Bring the milk in a large pan to boiling point. Then stir in the rice and sugar. Bring back to the boil, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, for about 30-40 min or until the milk has been absorbed.
Remove from the heat, add the butter and stir until melted. Allow the mixture to cool.
Arrange the fruit in the bases of individual glass heatproof ramekin dishes. Fold the cream into the rice mixture and spoon over the fruit layer.

Sprinkle the Demerara sugar over the top and place under a preheated hot grill for 2-3 min until the sugar turns to caramel. Serve immediately decorated with a sprinkling of caster sugar and a fresh mint leaf.

title: Fruity rice brulee
